pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bindings to the Calcite Design System 'JavaScript' Component Library // Provides access to the 'Calcite Design System' 'javascript' components via integration with the 'htmltools' and 'shiny' packages. Pre-built and interactive components can be used to generate either static html or interactive web applications. Learn more about the 'Calcite Design System' at https://developers.arcgis.com/calcite-design-system/.
